homePage.title: Home
homePage.description: Discover the gastronomic richness of Arroyo Seco, Querétaro. Explore traditional recipes, local ingredients and cultural events of the Sierra Gorda.
homePage.welcomeMessage: Discover the Flavors of Arroyo Seco
homePage.heroSubtitle: Explore the gastronomic richness of Sierra Gorda. Traditional recipes, local ingredients, and unique experiences.
homePage.offerDescription: Everything you need to explore and enjoy the gastronomic culture of Arroyo Seco
homePage.ctaDescription: Start your gastronomic journey through Arroyo Seco today

main.title: Arroyo Seco Locations
main.description: Explore restaurants, landmarks, markets and workshops in our magical town of the Sierra Gorda.

locationsPage.mapDescription: Explore restaurants, landmarks and events in our town

main.title: Gastronomy
main.description: Discover traditional recipes, local ingredients, and ancestral culinary techniques from the region.
main.recipesDescription: Learn to prepare authentic dishes from Arroyo Seco with local ingredients and techniques passed down through generations.
main.exploreSubtitle: Immerse yourself in the culinary world of Arroyo Seco and discover all its secrets
main.learnFromMastersDesc: Our culinary techniques have been perfected over generations. Each method tells a story and preserves the essence of our gastronomic culture.
main.readyToStart: Ready to Start Your Gastronomic Journey?
main.readyToStartDesc: Explore our recipes, local ingredients and traditional techniques. Discover the authentic flavors of Arroyo Seco.

recipes.title: Traditional Recipes
recipes.subtitle: Discover the authentic flavors of Arroyo Seco with our traditional recipes

ingredients.title: Local Ingredients
ingredients.subtitle: Discover the fresh, seasonal ingredients that make our cuisine unique

techniques.title: Culinary Techniques
techniques.subtitle: Learn the traditional methods passed down through generations

tools.title: Traditional Tools
tools.subtitle: Discover the utensils that have shaped our cuisine for generations
tools.culturalHeritageDesc: These tools are not just kitchen utensils, they are carriers of history, tradition and ancestral knowledge. Each represents centuries of refinement and adaptation to the needs of our cuisine.
tools.millennialTraditionDesc: Tools used for generations that keep our culture alive
tools.superiorQualityDesc: Natural materials that enhance the flavor and texture of food
tools.localCraftsDesc: Made by artisans who preserve ancestral techniques

main.title: Events in Arroyo Seco
main.subtitle: Discover the festivities and events that make our town a vibrant place full of tradition
main.description: Participate in gastronomic workshops, guided tours, and special cultural events.
main.noEventsFound: No events found with the selected filters

flavorRoute.title: La Ruta del Sabor
flavorRoute.subtitle: A culinary journey through the traditions of Arroyo Seco
flavorRoute.description: La Ruta del Sabor is the most important gastronomic event in Arroyo Seco, where visitors can taste the most representative dishes of our region while walking through the streets of the historic center. An event that celebrates our culinary and cultural identity.
flavorRoute.uniqueEvent: A unique event that celebrates the best of our culinary tradition
flavorRoute.shareEvent: Share this event with your friends and family

workshops.title: Workshops
workshops.subtitle: Learn new skills and immerse yourself in the traditions of Arroyo Seco with our specialized workshops
workshops.noWorkshopsFound: No workshops found in this category
workshops.registrationsDesc: Workshops are free and have limited capacity. Check availability at Casa de la Cultura.
workshops.certificatesDesc: Participation certificates are given to those who complete the workshop.
workshops.contactDesc: For more information, visit Casa de la Cultura or call (414) 123-4567

footer.description: Discover the gastronomic richness of Arroyo Seco, Querétaro. Explore traditional recipes, local ingredients and cultural events of the Sierra Gorda.
